TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueSource extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 报告从 返回的信息。

span.span: Reports the information returned from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传输的大多数信息都包含在属性中。Most of the information that transmits is contained in the property. 此属性包含一个枚举值, 该枚举值仅指定负责依赖[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性的有效值的总体属性系统的一个方面。This property contains an enumeration value that specifies exactly one aspect of the overall [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system that is responsible for the effective value of a dependency property. 除基值外, 有关依赖项属性值的其他信息, 也就是该值是否正在进行动画处理, 以及该值是否涉及表达式 (如绑定或动态资源引用)。Besides the base value, the other information that might be interesting about a dependency property value is whether the value is being animated, and whether the value involves an expression (such as a binding, or a dynamic resource reference). 此信息分别由和报告。This information is reported by and respectively. 此外, 如果强制在属性值上操作, 属性将保留所需的值, 并且如果更改或提升特定强制的约束, 则属性值将尝试访问该所需的值。Also, if coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 不在其所需值的已强制属性将报告为。 `true`A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 枚举的值，该值报告向依赖项属性系统提供值的源。

span.span: Gets a value of the enumeration, which reports the source that provided the dependency property system with a value.
A value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果强制或动画作用于属性, 则基值不是有效的值。The base value is not the effective value if either coercion or animation is acting on the property. 如果要确定基值是否为有效的值, 请选中 "与"。Check and if you want to determine whether the base value is the effective value. 您可能还需要检查基值是否计算出了表达式的值。You might also want to check to see if the base value was evaluated out of an expression.

param.name: o
param.span: 与此 进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this .

summary.span: 返回一个值，指示此 是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果提供的对象与当前 相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the provided object is equivalent to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持基于每个结构的每个属性值的值相等性。This implementation supports value equality, based on each of the property values of each structure.

span.span: A 32-bit unsigned integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此哈希代码基于值。This hash code is based on the value.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值声明是否对属性进行动画处理。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the property is being animated.

value.span: 如果对该属性进行动画处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is animated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于当前正在进行动画处理的任何属性, 由报告的源不会立即相关, 因为动画比基值的依赖属性优先级更高。For any property that is currently being animated, the source reported by is not immediately relevant, because the animation operates at higher dependency property precedence than the base value. 有关优先级和动画的详细信息, 请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about precedence and animations, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，声明此值是否是从应用于依赖属性的 实现中生成的。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property.

value.span: 如果此值是从应用于依赖项属性的 实现中生成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果强制在属性值上操作, 属性将保留一个所需值, 如果更改或提升了特定强制的约束, 则属性值将尝试访问该所需的值。If coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 不在其所需值的已强制属性将报告为。 `true`A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`. 强制的优先级高于基值, 并不严格地与基值的设置方式有关。Coercion acts at higher precedence than the base value, and is not strictly speaking a participant in how the base value is set. 因此, 被强制的状态由此属性而不是枚举的值报告。Therefore the state of being coerced is reported by this property, rather than by a value of the enumeration. 有关强制、基值和优先级的详细信息, 请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about coercion, base values, and precedence, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，声明此值是否是从计算的表达式中生成的。

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from an evaluated expression.

summary.span: 此表达式可能是支持绑定的 ，或者是一个内部表达式，比如支持 [DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)的那些表达式。

span.span: This might be a supporting a binding, or an internal expression such as those that support the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

value.span: 如果值来自于计算出的表达式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value came from an evaluated expression; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算后的表达式还将报告应用了表达式的特定基准值设置条件, 作为中的值。An evaluated expression will also report the specific base value setting condition where the expression was applied, as a value in . 对于任何属性, `true`它仍非常相关, 其中为。 The is still very relevant for any property where is `true`. 如果值是间接设置的 (如通过模板或继承的属性值进行设置), 了解值是否通过表达式会特别有用。Knowing whether a value came through an expression can be particularly useful if the value was set indirectly, such as through a template or an inherited property value. 如果表达式无法计算 (绑定失败, 找不到该名称的资源), 则值将来自属性系统中的其他某个参与者, 这很可能是默认值。If an expression fails to evaluate (the binding failed; no resource of that name was found), then the value will come from some other participant in the property system, most likely the default value. 然后, 将在中报告该源。That source is then reported in . 失败的表达式评估将`false`为返回。Failed expression evaluations will return `false` for .

returns.span: 如果两个 实例不等效，则为 ；否则为 。
